pkgmetadata.longdescription: =============python-useful=============A collection of utilities of everyday use when writingPython 3.x code *or* Django 3.2+ projects.**Python 2.x support has been dropped.**Overview--------This package is used by several living projects. The individual utilitiescontained are usually not depending on each other. Their layout and APIare considered stable honouring the backward compatibility.The project is divided into two sections:* **General Python stuff*** **Django-related utils** - located in the ``django`` packageThe code is documented, please find the description and examplesin the docstring of each utility.Installation------------Install either using pip:: pip install usefulor from source:: git clone https://github.com/tuttle/python-useful src/useful cd src/useful python setup.py developIf you are about to use the Django features like the templatetags,you can add to ``INSTALLED_APPS``:: INSTALLED_APPS = ( ... 'useful.django', )Please file an Issue on GitHub if you have bugreport, tip, anything.Thank you!
